title: Bug 17289 - Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: Try clicking on the first Combo.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not take focus anymore. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
EB: The expected behavior is that when I click on the first Combo, it should take focus as it did previously, without the need to drop down the combo list.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Launch the application.
2. Locate the first Combo element.
3. Click on the first Combo element.
